title: Calorie Calculator
very_active: Very active (hard exercise/sports 6-7 days a week)
super_active: Super active (very hard exercise/sports & physical job)
standard_daily_intake: Following is the standard daily calorie intake:
fat_intake: Fat should be 20 to 25% of total daily calorie intake.
cholesterol_intake: Cholesterol intake should not more than 300 mg/day.
carbohydrates_intake: Complex carbohydrates should comprise 50 to 60% of daily diet (app. 300g).
protein_intake: Protein should comprise 10 to 15% of daily diet (app. 50g).
fat_loss_info: Science tells us that 1 pound of fat is equal to 3500 calories, so a daily calorie deficit of 500 calorie should result in 1 pound per week fat loss. In reality things don't quite work that efficiently!
note: Note: Do not attempt to immediately drop your calories to this level hoping for the quick fix - this may ultimately backfire.
